original_title: Hollywood actor Christian Bale flies SriLankan
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Hollywood Actor Christian Bale was given a memorable Sri Lankan experience during a flight to Male from Colombo.
SriLankan Airlines said that legendary actor, Christian Bale flew on UL 115 on April 3, 2023.
According to flight data, UL 115 traveled from Colombo to Male, Maldives on Monday (3).
"It was our absolute pleasure to have presented him a memorable Sri Lankan experience on his journey. We anticipate welcoming him again soon!," said SriLankan Airlines on Twitter.
Sri Lanka increases fuel quota for vehicles with effect from Tuesday (4) night
State workers who are contesting LG election to get basic salary
